Languages.string: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Source
MonsterTrait.Text: Tales from the Yawning Portal, page 237

MonsterTrait.Name: Undead Nature
MonsterTrait.Text: A zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Turn Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Undead Fortitude
MonsterTrait.Text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Empowered Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
